reviewText: Chris is intellegent, inventive and mucical.  Not only that, he's actually a pretty good teacher, surprisingly good.  If you like his stuff or just want to add some finger style licks to your repetoir this is a great learning tool has the tab, has the vib.  I am a Chris Smither fan/groupy and more so after seeing a guy who's a virtuoso teach with humor and humility.  Hard not to like this instruction DVD.
